Description:
Develop and implement policies, procedures, and processes that improve operational efficiency
Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and suppliers
Oversee daily operations, including production, logistics, and customer service
Manage budgets, forecasts, and financial performance to meet KPIs
Identify and resolve any problems or issues that arise in a timely manner
Develop and implement quality control measures to ensure products or services meet or exceed industry standards
Motivate, supervise, and train staff to achieve operational goalsJob Details
